name: Meter Feeder
headline: Pay for parking by turning your car off.
description: Cities are losing billions of dollars trying to price the curb for shared vehicles (Car2Go, Scoot, FedEx). Meter Feeder enables traditional and autonomous vehicles to pay for parking with no human interaction, so cities can make money, and fleets can remain compliant.

founders.name: Jim Gibbs, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Software developer by trade. Professionally solve pain points.

## Welcome to Meter Feeder. We make parking simple.
### Choose your user type:
[![car icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60749c07d05922863eae5e3b/607736c4ee93d717ca2b5523_noun_Carriage_2983655.svg)IndividualsSecurely pay for parking with just one button tap.Learn more![More info](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60749c07d05922863eae5e3b/60749c07d059224b3fae5e7a_Arrow%20Right%20\(1\).svg)](http://www.meterfeeder.com/</individuals>)[![fleet icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60749c07d05922863eae5e3b/607736e757fd39fc6d768986_noun_traffic%20jam_2983695.svg)FleetsPay for parking, and parking tickets, with no human interaction.Learn more![More info](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60749c07d05922863eae5e3b/60749c07d059224b3fae5e7a_Arrow%20Right%20\(1\).svg)](http://www.meterfeeder.com/</fleets>)[![A city icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60749c07d05922863eae5e3b/607737009e12eddbb42bc793_noun_City_3386644.svg)MunicipalitiesManage parking enforcement and payments at your scale.Learn more![More info](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60749c07d05922863eae5e3b/60749c07d059224b3fae5e7a_Arrow%20Right%20\(1\).svg)](http://www.meterfeeder.com/</municipalities>)
These authorities trust Meter Feeder
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60749c07d05922863eae5e3b/650dccd07fcea5faab5b7bbb_Screenshot%202023-09-22%20at%201.19.59%20PM.png)![St Marys logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60749c07d05922863eae5e3b/609d5abc0c7d3c857b42c5f5_stmarys_bw.png)![Peoples Parking Authority of Pittsburgh logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60749c07d05922863eae5e3b/609d5abc60c9bba6f44cb743_ppap_bw.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60749c07d05922863eae5e3b/6540fc36e5830f726b326c49_Greensburg%20-%20meter%20Feeder%20Parking%20App.png)![Nexus Parking System logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60749c07d05922863eae5e3b/609d915d212620198acec2bf_nexus_bw.png)
# Download the Meter Feeder App today
Seriously...No need for passwords, signups, or 6-digit codes. Just a simple way to pay for parking.
[![Download Meter Feeder from the app store](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60749c07d05922863eae5e3b/6078ef4d2de21328eb7a4dbd_Download_on_the_App_Store_Badge_US-UK_RGB_blk_092917.svg)](http://www.meterfeeder.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/meter-feeder-app/id936548422>)[![Download Meter Feeder from Google Play](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60749c07d05922863eae5e3b/6078f01cfab18e41bc3483d2_iis_Get_it_on_Google_play.png)](http://www.meterfeeder.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.meterfeederapp.parker&hl=en_US>)

# Mobile Paymentsat Your Scale.
Our mission is to provide a low cost payment and enforcement solution for authorities of all sizes. We have testimonials from Borough Managers and Police Chiefs showing that our state of the art technology is ready and available for even the most budget-minded municipality.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60749c07d05922863eae5e3b/609d97f92e5723a294f09c80_MeterFeeder_Horizontal%20\(r\)-WHITE_sm.png)

generated_description:
**Meter Feeder: Simplifying Parking Payments**

**Overview**
Founded in 2015 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch W16, Meter Feeder is shaking up the parking game from its home base in Pittsburgh, PA. With a compact team of four, this company targets a significant pain point for cities and fleets alike: the inefficiencies in parking payment systems.

**Mission**
The aim of Meter Feeder is straightforward but powerful: “Pay for parking by turning your car off.” This eliminates the common friction points associated with parking, supporting both traditional and autonomous vehicles in a seamless, human-free payment experience. This not only helps cities monetize their parking capabilities more effectively but ensures compliance for fleet vehicles.

**The Problem It Addresses**
Cities are losing out on billions because they struggle to manage curb space effectively for shared vehicles—think of services like Car2Go and FedEx. Meter Feeder directly addresses this by providing a platform that allows real-time payment without human intervention. This means less hassle for drivers and more revenue for municipal authorities.

**Market Positioning**
The company operates in an intersection of technology and government services, tagged under **machine-learning**, **govtech**, and **unmanned-vehicle**. By leveraging technology, Meter Feeder offers a low-cost payment and enforcement solution suitable for municipalities of all sizes, allowing them to drive efficiency and revenue.

**User Experience**
With a focus on user-friendliness, Meter Feeder allows individuals, fleets, and municipalities to manage their parking needs effectively. Users can pay seamlessly through a dedicated app with minimal steps—no passwords, no elaborate registration.

**Support and Trust**
The company is building credibility with municipalities and authorities who trust its service, evidenced by testimonials from city officials and parking managers. This trust is crucial as it reinforces the brand's reliability in helping local governments manage their parking systems.

**Conclusion**
Meter Feeder is positioned as a game-changer in parking payment infrastructure—an essential tool in a world that's moving towards autonomous vehicles and smarter city operations. They combine technology with practical solutions and ensure that the revenue lost to outdated systems is reclaimed through a modernized payment system. It's a win-win for drivers, cities, and fleets. 

For more details or to explore their offerings, visit [meterfeeder.com](http://www.meterfeeder.com).
